main.name: Milton Arce
main.description: Usually working with JavaScript (React), HTML5, CSS and PHP (Laravel). I'm 26 years old and I'm studying Web developer career in Esculea Davinci, i never stopped learning.
main.bio: Web designer and developer in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and Php among others. Willing to overcome both my personal goals and those of the company. Motivated to work as a team and to be able to demand my limits to accomplish the objectives given. Grow both in experience and in knowledge.

work.title: Full Stack Developer / Responsible for collaborative applications
work.description: Responsible for collaborative applications and Full Stack developer. I control approximately between 25 and 30 applications for internal users and clients. I usually do maintenance, updating, modification and development of them. I work with technologies like, Wordpress, Php, Laravel, Mysql, JavaScript Native, Jquery, AngularJs, React, Html5, Css3, Sass, Bootstrap, Materialize, Material-ui, Antd, NodeJs, Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator, Git with Jira and Bitbucket among others.

work.title: Web Developer / Responsible for collaborative applications
work.description: Responsible for collaborative applications, administration, development and maintenance of corporate websites and apps. Here I work with technologies such as Html5, css3, Native JavaScript, Php and Wordpress. Also perform some Ui-Ux Design and Helpdesk tasks.

work.title: Helpdesk IT
work.description: Technical support for big companies on networks and internet connections.

testimonials.text: Como profesor muchas veces vemos que los alumnos quieren llegar al resultado y no al aprendizaje, Milton en cambio siempre priorizo entender los temas para poder mejorarlos constantemente, avanzando r치pido en poco tiempo. Su constancia y dedicaci칩n son aspectos a destacar.
